TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_lilis, title = lilis, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/lilis} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:邊) amana paceba muisi' i lilis nu zazan. 不要隨便在路邊小便.
(kamo no holam:邊) amana paceba moisi' i lilis no zazan. 不要隨便在路邊小便.
